vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.27;
son of: Jaaziah (H3269);
brother of: Beno (H1121B), Zaccur (H2139I) and Ibri (H5681)
§ Shoham = "onyx"
a Merarite Levite, son of Jaaziah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   piedra preciosa; KB NEB TEV cornalina; LXX berilo; RSV NIV ónix; JB berilo; (2)   descendiente de Merarí; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
朔含 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "瑪瑙"
米拉利族的利未人, 雅西雅的兒子 (代上 24:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
朔含 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "玛瑙"
米拉利族的利未人, 雅西雅的儿子 (代上 24:27)
